channel.title: Torrance County|New Mexico|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Torrance County|New Mexico|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: NM-3 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on NM-3 north. Distance to Villanueva and I-25.

item.title: NM-3 North - Torrance County
item.description: NM-3 north shield in Torrance County.

item.title: I-40 East at NM-3
item.description: I-40 east Exit 230 at NM-3. Turn right on NM-3 for Encino; turn left for Villanueva State Park, Agua Verde Ranch, and Melaz Camp.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 230
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 230 - NM-3/Villanueva/Encino.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 226
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 226.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 218
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 218 - US-285/Vaughn/Santa Fe.

item.title: I-40 East Approaching Exit 218
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 218. Use Exit 218 for Clines Corners, and Encino.

item.title: I-40 East - Gateway To Southeast New Mexico
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 218. US-285 - Gateway to Southeast New Mexico. Use US-285 south for Roswell, Artesia, and Carlsbad.

item.title: I-40 East Approaching Exit 218
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 218 - US-285/Santa Fe/Vaughn.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 208
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 208 - Wagon Wheel.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 203
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 203 in Torrance County.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 198
item.description: I-40 east at Exit 198 - BL-40/Moriarty East/Route 66. This is the eastern end of the Moriarty business loop.

item.title: I-40 East - Exit 196
item.description: I-40 East approaching Exit 196 - NM-41/Howards Cavasos Blvd. The I-40 sign in the background is pretty common on I-40 east out of Albuquerque.

item.title: I-40 East Approaching Exit 194
item.description: I-40 east approaching Exit 194 - BL-40/Moriarty West/Route 66.

item.title: I-40 East - Moriarty Exits
item.description: Moriarty Exits on I-40 east. Moriarty West, Howard Cavasos Blvd. and Moriarty East.

item.title: US-60 West Approaching NM-55
item.description: US-60 West approaching NM-55 in Mountainair.

item.title: NM-41 South Approaching NM-55
item.description: NM-41 South approaching NM-55 in Estancia.

item.title: NM-41 South at BL-40
item.description: NM-41 south at BL-40 in Moriarty. Use BL-40 west for Albuquerque; use BL-40 east for Clines Corners. Continue south on NM-41 for Estancia.

item.title: NM-41 South at I-40 East
item.description: NM-41 South at I-40 East onramp to Santa Rosa. Continue south on NM-41 for Estancia.

item.title: NM-41 South at I-40
item.description: NM-41 south at I-40 (Exit 196) junction. Use I-40 west for Albuquerque; use I-40 east for Clines Corners. Continue south on NM-41 for Estancia.
